oai_dc:dc.dc:title: UWB printed sectoral monopole antenna with dual polarization
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAY, KP
THAKUR, SS
DESHMUKH, RA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: printed sectoral monopole antenna
dual-polarization
polarization diversity
ultra wide bandwidth
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A printed sectoral monopole antenna with ultra wide bandwidth has been proposed. This configuration is formed by chopping off a quarter part of a circular printed disc. The ultra wide bandwidth has been obtained in the frequency range from 1.84 to 11.82 GHz with dual polarization radiation patterns. The experimental and simulated results for this proposed antenna are presented, which are in agreement. (C) 2012 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Microwave Opt Technol Lett 54:206-62070, 2012; View this article online at wileyonlinelibrary.com. DOI 10.1002/mop.27039
